text:
Touring - Thing - Homebody - Joy - Things

(Excerpt) Read more at: E! Online

Wake Up To Breaking News! SUBMIT

No wonder she swears so much—it probably helps her relax! She even smashed her own swearing record at Wembley Stadium on Wednesday, according to The Sun, uttering anywhere from 52 to 56 swears (depending on what you consider to be profanity). Her previous high was 33 swears at the Glastonbury Festival last year.About to wrap up her Adele Live 2017 tour in her native England this weekend, the programs handed out to concertgoers at Wembley contained copies of a handwritten note from the star in which she expressed her gratitude just in case this it it for her."Touring is a peculiar thing, it doesn't suit me particularly well," she wrote. "I'm a real homebody and I get so much joy in the small things. Plus I'm dramatic and...
title: Why Adele May Be Saying Goodbye: Stage Fright, Her "Terrible History of Touring" and a Complicated Relationship With Fame
